translations.text: A description of the contents of the article. This description will usually occur outside of context and must therefore give meaning only along with the title. Max 254 characters.
You may here upload a file to the server.
The whole story and all comments
Enter the first paragraph or so here. This will appear on lists of stories, with links on to the rest.
Enter the rest of the content.
You may use Textile in this field.
The address of a descriptive image.
A good, descriptive text to be used for the link to the rest of the story. "Read More" is a common, but very bad choice.
Give the primary categorization for the story. Uses a controlled vocabulary.
Choose the section to post the article to.
A newly posted article will be added to a separate section for editor's approval. The editor must move it over to the appropriate section when the article is approved.
A short, one-word name for the story.
When an unprivileged user posts an article, the article will get a random five-digit number. The editor should replace this with a reasonably descriptive word.
The username of the person who submitted the story.
The username of the author of the article. All authors should be registered within the system.
User name is allready in use or is invalid!
The category name is allready in use!
Choose a single-word username. It can be up to 8 characters, and use only lower-case letters from a-z. Your username will also appear in the address of comments you post.
A valid e-mail address. Your password will be sent to this address.
The address of a web page that describes you
A short text that describes you
To change password, enter new password twice
The authorization level determines what kind of actions you are allowed to do.
The password is recognized as valid.
The password you gave has not been recognized as valid.
The username you gave does not match that of any users of this system.
Short version of the category name

Choose a short version of the name for the category. Must be a single word, can be up to 15 characters, and use only lower-case letters from a-z. This name will also often appear in the address of pages.
The name of the category as it will be displayed to readers of the page.

To identify things by the use of so-called URIs is an important thing in the future of the web. It is wise to choose terms from e.g. WordNet, but if you really don't know what we're talking about here, you may want to leave it to the administrator.
One can make new categories, either as free subject terms, as part of a vocabulary for primary or secondary classification or as a section to the news pages.
A description of the category. This description will often occur outside of context, and should therefore give meaning only along with the name. Max 254 characters.
